backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining storage, auth mixins, data types, and CRUD/query methods for profiles, jobs, applications, posts, and messages.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report describing a feature request to replace a static logo asset and its related components and test evidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their roles in routing, pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions with light/dark mode CSS custom properties.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for landing, onboarding, dashboard sections, and admin panel.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminPassw: Password gate component that validates admin password input and displays errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a non-admin user attempts to access admin-only areas.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminMutat: React Query mutation hooks for admin CRUD actions on vacancies and posts with password-session handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useApplicatio: React Query hooks to fetch the callerâ€™s applications and submit new job applications.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthorized: Runs an authorized user search using the actor and admin password, locking on unauthorized errors.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerRole: Fetches the current caller's user role from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCallerUser: Retrieves the caller's profile and provides a mutation to save profile updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useJobs.ts: Provides queries to list, search, and fetch individual job vacancies from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useMessages.t: Fetches inbox and sent messages and offers a mutation to send new messages.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Loads a list of posts from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPassword.ts: Manages an admin session password with sessionStorage persistence and lock/unlock handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity loading, and auth client management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout providing password-gated access, navigation tabs, and a content outlet.
Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete posts with image upload support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/VacanciesAdminP: Admin page for managing job vacancies, including creation, editing, and deletion.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/BrowseJobsP: Displays searchable job listings with search controls and navigation to job details.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/DashboardLa: User dashboard layout handling authentication, profile loading, navigation tabs, and logout.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/JobDetailPa: Shows detailed job info and allows users to apply with a cover letter and resume upload.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MessagesPag: Admin-focused messaging UI that lets admins search users, view inbox/sent messages, and send messages with validation and date formatting.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/MyApplicati: Displays the user's job applications with job details, status indicators, and formatted dates.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/ProfilePage: User profile editor allowing updates to personal info and resume upload with progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/dashboard/UpdatesPage: Renders posts and announcements with optional images and formatted creation dates.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page that handles login and redirects users based on profile and role.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardingPage.tsx: Onboarding form for creating the caller's profile with optional resume upload.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL or session-based parameters including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing current features, logo replacement requirements, and configuration details.
